verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
I see the cloud, I step in
I want to see Your glory as Moses did
Flashes of light, rolls of thunder

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Im not afraid
Im not afraid

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Show me your glory
Show me your glory
Show me your glory
Show me your glory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
Im awed by your beauty, lost in your eyes
I want to walk in your presence, like Jesus did
Your glory surrounds me, and Im overwhelmed

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
I long to look on the face of the one that I love
Long to stay in your presence its where I belong
